tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT,
    precipitation FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Flight_Records (
   Flight_ID INT,
   Date DATE,
   Departure_Location TEXT,
   Destination TEXT,
   Flight_Status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Flying_Conditions (
   Date DATE,
   Temperature_Range TEXT,
   Wind_Speed_Range TEXT,
   Humidity_Range TEXT,
   Conditions_Detail TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE weather_conditions (
    condition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    condition_name VARCHAR(50),
    temperature FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE flights (
    flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    airport_id INT,
    condition_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (airport_id) REFERENCES airports(airport_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (condition_id) REFERENCES weather_conditions(condition_id)
);

CREATE TABLE flight_data (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 date DATE,
 flight_number VARCHAR,
 departure_time TIMESTAMP,
 arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE flight_conditions (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 flight_number VARCHAR,
 date DATE,
 temperature FLOAT,
 wind_speed FLOAT,
 humidity FLOAT,
 wind_direction VARCHAR
);
